person.persName: Zachariah Madison Sherley (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, civilian steamboat captain and boat store keeper)

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, civilian steamboat captain and boat store keeper. Louisa County, Virginia, native. Married to Susan Shirley. Father of George D. Sherley. Steam boat furnisher in Louisville in 1860. Partner in Louisville & Cincinnati United States Mail Line in Louisville in 1862. Co-owner of Sherley, Woolfolk, & Co. in Louisville. Served as president of the board of directors of the Louisville and Jeffersonville Ferry Co. in Louisville. Founder of Citizens National Bank in Louisville. Trustee for the medical college at the University of Louisville in Louisville. Member of the board of trustees of the Kentucky Institute for the Blind in Louisville. Trustee of Cave Hill Cemetery in Louisville.
